mapper.insert: insert into fm_hot_book values(#{hot_num}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{nationality}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{card}, sysdate, #{people}, #{roomselect}, #{permit}, fm_hot_book_bookingnum.nextval, #{room_idx})
mapper.select: select h.*, roomname from fm_hot_book h, fm_hotroom r where h.hot_num=#{hot_num} and r.room_idx=h.room_idx and (to_char(checkin,'yyyy-MM-DD')) like ''||#{checkin}||'%' order by checkin
select c.cm_name,h.checkin,h.checkout,h.bookingdate,h.permit from fm_hot_book h,fm_company c where h.hot_num=c.cm_number and h.name = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update fm_hot_book set permit=1 where bookingnum=#{bookingnum} and hot_num=#{hot_num}
mapper.delete: delete from fm_hot_book where hot_num=#{hot_num} and bookingnum=#{bookingnum}
mapper.select: select h.*, roomname, cm_name from fm_hot_book h, fm_hotroom r, fm_company where bookingnum=#{bookingnum} and r.room_idx=h.room_idx and cm_number=h.hot_num
mapper.update: update fm_hotroom set roomnum=roomnum+1 where room_idx=#{room_idx} and roomnum < maxroom
